title: Best of the Program | Guests: Donald J. Trump & Sen. Mike Lee
description:
Former President Trump joins Glenn to discuss the bombshell confirmation that Hillary Clinton was spying on his 2016 presidential campaign. Sen. Mike Lee joins to discuss the bill he introduced regarding vaccine mandates. Justin Haskins, co-author of "The Great Reset," along with Rep. Michael Murphy, joins Glenn to discuss fighting ESG scores.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
